flawed_nl_solution:
In ten years, Jackson will be 20+10 = 30 years old.
If Jackson is 20 now, Mandy is 20+10 = <<20+10=30>>30 years old.
Ten years from now, Mandy will be 30+10 = <<30+10=40>>40 years old.
The combined age of Jackson and Mandy ten years from now is 30+40 = <<30+40=70>>70 years
Adele is 3/4 times as old as Jackson, meaning she is 3/4*20 = <<3/4*20=80/3>>80/3 years old.
Adele's age will be 10+80/3 = <<10+80/3=110/3>>110/3 years old ten years from now.
Altogether, Mandy, Jackson, and Adele will have a total of 110/3+70 = <<110/3+70=320/3>>320/3 years
#### 320/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 80/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
